tengi: Near-Realtime Communication Foundation

tengi is designed as a cross-language, near-realtime, push communication platform.

See: Description

Core Packages 
Package Description
com.noctarius.tengi.core.config
The config package contains the configuration interfaces and a ConfigurationBuilder for creating immutable configuration that can easily be shared between threads.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.connection
The connection package contains the common interfaces to work with server or client connections.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.exception
The exception package contains all tengi related exceptions.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.listener
The listener package contains the common listener interfaces for messages (MessageListener) and any kind of connection events (ConnectionListener as well as broken down interfaces for Java 8 support.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.model
The model package contains the common element classes for network transmission.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.serialization
The serialization package contains all commonly used interfaces and base-classes for the bundled serialization framework as well as several sub-packages related with serialization.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.serialization.codec
The codec package contains the base interfaces for encoding (Encoder) and decoding (Decoder) data to and from a byte-stream.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.serialization.debugger
The debugger package contains the public classes for the serialization debugger.
com.noctarius.tengi.core.serialization.marshaller
The marshaller package contains the interfaces to implement custom marshallers to serialize and de-serialize objects and to support immutability on those objects.
Server Packages 
Package Description
com.noctarius.tengi.server
The server package contains classes necessary to create a server instance inside applications.
Client Packages 
Package Description
com.noctarius.tengi.client
The client package contains classes necessary to create a client instance inside applications.
SPI Packages 
Package Description
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.buffer
The buffer package contains interfaces for the internal representation of a memory buffer and is necessary when implementing custom data protocols or data-type encoders / decoders.
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection
The connection package contains interfaces and base-classes necessary to implement custom transports using the provided SPI.
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.connection.packets
The packets package contains basic packets for long-polling and handshake operations used when implementing custom transports.
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.logging
The logging package contains the internally used logging framework and should be used when implementing custom extensions against the provided SPI.
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.pooling
The pooling package contains the internally used ObjectPool SPI.
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.serialization
The serialization package contains interfaces to implement custom serializers and / or protocols.
com.noctarius.tengi.spi.serialization.codec
The codec package contains the interfaces for implementing a custom data-type codec (encoder / decoder).
tengi is designed as a cross-language, near-realtime, push communication platform. Using several distinct transport layers, tengi always finds the most efficient way to communicate between the client and server. Available transports range from a plain TCP transmission over RDP (a reliable UDP implementation), standard UDP or HTTP Long-Polling as fallback.
